hackathon-requirements: Your project must serve the prompt of the nonprofit you are collaborating with. If you build a technical product, our only requirement is that it has the functionality that you present to the nonprofits.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Each team member on the winning teams (1 team per nonprofit) will receive a $50 Amazon Gift Card.

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: If you designed a technical project, it must have most of the functionality that you describe it does.
Does the nonprofit you worked with find the product useful, and will they consider implementing it in a production environment?
How novel is your solution? Does it solve an existing problem in a unique way? Does it improve upon an existing solution?

hackathon-description-header: Innovate, collaborate, and create for nonprofits!
